title: My border in the lobby is unranked, even though I ended the previous season in gold?
body: I have the gold profile icon that closes when you search in queue but not the border.

replies.body:
If I'm understanding this correctly, you're referring to the border around your icon while in a pre-made lobby?

If so, then my understanding is that you'll need to manually change the option so that it shows your ranked border, rather than level (or "prestige") border. You can change this option by opening the "icon and border selector" by clicking on your icon in the top right of the client, or on the Overview tab of your Profile page.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=Z3VToNPG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-12-15T04:13:31.263+0000)
>
> If I'm understanding this correctly, you're referring to the border around your icon while in a pre-made lobby?
> 
> If so, then my understanding is that you'll need to manually change the option so that it shows your ranked border, rather than level (or "prestige") border. You can change this option by opening the "icon and border selector" by clicking on your icon in the top right of the client, or on the Overview tab of your Profile page.

Sorry not the border around my icon, the actual banner

In the "icon/border selector" there's also an option for "Show Past Ranked Banner". So far as I know it should be defaulted to "on", but I'd recommend just checking that to be sure (even if it is on, you could try turning it off and on to see if that helps). If that option is already on, then I'd say your best bet is to submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and see if they can help.
same problem I ended in gold IV and I have no banner. Just the border around my icon in a premade lobby.

Were you honour 2 at season end? If not, that's why, as those borders are classed as ranked rewards and have all the same requirements.

If you were, then I'd take a look at HeartVine's comment:

>In the "icon/border selector" there's also an option for "Show Past Ranked Banner". So far as I know it should be defaulted to "on", but I'd recommend just checking that to be sure (even if it is on, you could try turning it off and on to see if that helps). If that option is already on, then I'd say your best bet is to submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and see if they can help.
Banners show previous season right? Not current rank?
